data.lyric:
[ti:A$AP Forever (Clean)]
[ar:A$AP Rocky/Moby]
[al:A$AP Forever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A$AP Forever (Explicit) - A$AP Rocky/Moby (莫比)
[00:00.58]Written by：Rakim Mayers/Hector Delgado/Richard Melville Hall/Chloe Danquah
[00:01.16]A$AP Rocky：
[00:01.74]Gang gang gang
[00:05.60]
[00:08.42]They talkin' down on my name
[00:09.36]
[00:10.05]Don't let 'em run off with the name
[00:11.19]
[00:12.09]Man I just run with the gang
[00:13.17]
[00:14.00]A$AP boys came with the flame
[00:14.96]
[00:15.91]Gang gang
[00:17.04]
[00:17.70]They talkin' down on the gang
[00:18.76]
[00:19.69]They wanna rep with the name
[00:20.67]
[00:21.41]But this ain't no regular name
[00:22.50]
[00:23.55]Gang gang
[00:24.65]
[00:25.42]They tryna run with the name
[00:26.39]
[00:27.31]I might pull up with three K
[00:28.41]
[00:29.09]But I do not f**k with no Klan
[00:30.37]
[00:31.23]Gang gang
[00:32.31]
[00:33.11]Them boys not flexin' the same
[00:34.29]
[00:34.83]I'm done with adjustin' to fame
[00:35.90]
[00:36.72]Pull up on your set leave a stain
[00:38.02]
[00:38.77]Gang gang
[00:39.83]
[00:40.47]I tell her come f**k with the gang
[00:41.78]
[00:42.36]I tell 'em don't f**k with the gang
[00:43.69]
[00:44.28]It's time to f**k up the whole game
[00:45.81]Come f**k with the Mob shout out to the Lords and the Gods
[00:48.12]In love with my b**ch 'cause she bi
[00:49.59]My ice like the stars I tell that b**ch cover your eyes
[00:51.89]Cause smokin' with me you go blind
[00:53.40]She losin' her mind we kiss to Frank Ocean and Blonde
[00:55.63]Convincin' my b**ch to go blonde
[00:57.32]Was born in the dark I can't even open my blinds
[00:59.49]On Yams and that's word to my mom
[01:01.04]Margiela mad man with cases I'm still tryna beat
[01:03.40]A bunch of sh*t from a long time ago
[01:05.33]The bigger they are the harder they fall
[01:07.18]Like dominos n**ga Geronimos
[01:08.81]When it's my time to go adios vamonos
[01:10.77]Flacko no Dominicano but eat the tostones with platanos
[01:13.32]Dealing with life and its highs and lows
[01:15.24]I'm just livin' like I'm supposed
[01:16.66]I guess it's called livin' sh*t I suppose
[01:18.55]I'm on my live alone die VLONE
[01:20.40]You talk about spending or buyin' clothes
[01:22.01]
[01:22.61]I'm 'bout my business but I'm alone
[01:24.39]I still had the vision when I was broke
[01:26.39]F**kin' on b**ches and foreign h**s
[01:27.77]
[01:28.30]Flyin' out womens to borin' shows
[01:30.04]I pray to God I don't overdose
[01:31.86]I put A$AP on my tat
[01:33.17]
[01:33.97]I put New York on the map
[01:35.06]
[01:35.66]I put the gang on the flame
[01:36.96]
[01:37.56]They gon' remember the name
[01:38.78]
[01:39.74]They robbin' boys for the chain
[01:40.75]
[01:41.35]I got Goyard by the sack
[01:42.54]
[01:43.39]I got the boof by the pack
[01:44.55]
[01:45.27]I f**ked your boo in her back
[01:46.68]
[01:47.37]Gang gang
[01:48.47]
[01:49.19]Them boys not flexing the same
[01:50.35]
[01:51.04]I'm done with adjusting to fame
[01:52.09]
[01:52.93]Pull up on your set leave a stain
[01:54.20]
[01:54.95]Gang gang
[01:56.06]
[01:56.67]I tell her come f**k with the gang
[01:57.83]
[01:58.55]I tell 'em don't f**k with the gang
[01:59.76]
[02:00.36]It's time to f**k up the whole game
[02:01.90]Game game game game
[02:03.88]A$AP Rocky/Khloe Anna：
[02:04.70]Gang gang
[02:06.74]
[02:07.88]They tryna front on the gang they gon' remember my name
[02:11.70]
[02:13.26]True to truth somehow gang gang
[02:16.86]
[02:17.84]But never truly lied at all then and now
[02:19.77]They tryna front on the gang
[02:21.87]
[02:23.57]Truth somehow
[02:24.29]Gang A$AP boys come with the flame
[02:26.80]But never truly lied at all then and now
[02:30.61]
[02:33.31]True to truth somehow
[02:36.40]But never truly lied at all then and now
[02:40.23]
[02:41.89]Khloe Anna/Moby：
[02:42.44]
[02:46.54]True to truth somehow
[02:49.27]
[02:50.26]But never truly lied at all then and now
[02:54.88]
[02:56.79]True to truth somehow
[02:59.38]
[03:00.36]But never truly lied at all then and now
[03:04.78]
[03:06.93]True to truth somehow
[03:09.62]
[03:10.56]But never truly lied at all then and now
[03:14.96]
[03:16.75]True to truth somehow
[03:19.66]
[03:20.59]But never truly lied at all then and now
[03:24.38]In my dreams I'm dying all the time
[03:27.43]True to truth somehow
[03:29.87]
[03:31.08]But never truly lied at all then and now
[03:34.67]Then I wake it's kaleidoscopic mind
[03:36.63]But never truly lied at all
[03:39.20]
[03:40.84]But never truly lied at all then and now
[03:44.87]I never meant to hurt you then and now
[03:48.51]I never meant to lie
